text:
@charliekirk11 The Oregon County's racism is at a much higher level.

Science says the Coronavirus hits Black people much harder than White people.

Lincoln County is making Blacks more vulnerable to death than White people!

The county wanting Blacks DEAD is a much worse type of racism.

No?
